title: 3D Train
description: 3D Train. Interactive demo showing a simple web page.

title: Rasterization
description: Rasterization. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Rasterization demo: When "Draw" is checked, use mouse or touch to draw lines; when "Draw" is not checked, use mouse or touch to select a region to show pixel colors. Use the textarea to write a function(canvas, context) and use the button to evaluate the function.

title: Blank canvas
description: Blank canvas. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Canvas demo: Just a simple HTML Canvas. Use the textarea to write a function(canvas, context) and use the button to evaluate the function.

title: Draw ellipse
description: Draw ellipse. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Ellipse demo: Use the textarea to write a function(canvas, context) and use the button to evaluate the function.

title: Polygon fill rule pentagram
description: Polygon fill rule pentagram. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons. Pentagram demo: Use the textarea to provide a list of vertices (each line has two numbers, comma separated, negative number or empty line means moveTo). Mouse click will draw a ray from the point with the specified angle (from x-axis).

title: Polygon fill rule two triangles
description: Polygon fill rule two triangles. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons. Pentagram demo: Use the textarea to provide a list of vertices (each line has two numbers, comma separated, negative number or empty line means moveTo). Mouse click will draw a ray from the point with the specified angle (from x-axis).

title: Animation bouncing ball
description: Animation bouncing ball. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Bounce demo: Use the textarea to write a function(time, canvas, context) to animate a rectangle as a function of time.

title: Animation as a function of time
description: Animation as a function of time. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Animation demo - use time: Use the textarea to write a function(time, canvas, context) to move a rectangle as a function of time.

title: Animation as a function of state
description: Animation as a function of state. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Animation demo - use position: Use the textarea to write a function(time, position, canvas, context) to move a rectangle as a function of its position (vector of two numbers).

title: Animation as a function of mouse event
description: Animation as a function of mouse event. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Animation Demo - use event: Use the textarea to write a function(event, position, canvas, context) to move a rectangle as a function of the mouse position.

title: Animation with rotation
description: Animation with rotation. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Animation demo - use transform: Use the textarea to write a function(time, canvas, context) to move a rectangle as a function of time (can use translate, rotate, scale). The animation loop resets the transformation after each frame.

title: Order of transformation
description: Order of transformation. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Transform demo - combine Translate, Rotate, Scale: Use the textarea to write a function(x, y, r, sx, sy; canvas, context) to move the rectangle as a function of the slider values: translate(x, y), rotate(r), scale(sx, sy).

title: Scaling around a center
description: Scaling around a center. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox. Transform demo: Assume draw() draws the cat, write the code in the text area to translate, rotate, and scale it. Use the "flip" button to reverse the order of transformations in the first text area.

title: Animation as a function of slider event
description: Animation as a function of slider event. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Animation demo - use slider: Use the textarea to write a function(value, canvas, context) to move a rectangle as a function of the slider value (can use translate, rotate, scale). Checkbox controls slider and slider value controls animation (from 0 to 1 and 1 back to 0 and repeat).

title: Robotic arm hierarchy
description: Robotic arm hierarchy. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Robotic arm demo: Use the textarea to write a function(v1, v2, v3; canvas, context) to move a arms as a function of the slider values (can use translate, rotate, scale).

title: Two robotic arms hierarchy
description: Two robotic arms hierarchy. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Robotic arm demo: Use the textarea to write a function(v1, v2, v3, v4, v5, v6; canvas, context) to move a arms as a function of the slider values (can use translate, rotate, scale).

title: Two trees hierarchy
description: Two trees hierarchy. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Robotic arm demo - tree version: Use the textarea to write a function(v1, v2, v3, v4, v5, v6; canvas, context) to move a arms as a function of the slider values (can use translate, rotate, scale).

title: Dancing stick figure hierarchy
description: Dancing stick figure hierarchy. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Dancing Figure demo: Use the textarea to write a function(value, canvas, context) to move the arms and legs as a function of the slider value (can use translate, rotate, scale). Checkbox controls slider and slider value controls animation (from 0 to 1 and loops).

title: Robotic arm SVG
description: Robotic arm SVG. Interactive demo showing a canvas-based demo with a code textbox, buttons. Robotic arm demo - svg: Use the textarea to write a function(v1, v2, v3, v4, v5, v6; canvas, context) to move a arms as a function of the slider values (can use translate, rotate, scale).

title: General transformation matrix
description: General transformation matrix. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons. Matrix multiplication demo: Compute composite transformations using matrix multiplication. Apply composite transformations to the unit square (not using `context.transform`).

title: Homogeneous coordinate system
description: Homogeneous coordinate system. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene. Homogeneous coordinate demo: Translate, rotate, scale the square in 2D by using a linear transformation matrix in 3D.

title: Affine transformation matrix
description: Affine transformation matrix. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons, checkboxes. Transformation matrix demo: Write the transformation matrix so that the square is transformed into the polygon when the `context.transform` is applied.

title: Parameterization
description: Parameterization. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Parameterization demo: Draw a curve parameterized by t in [0, 1]. The same curve can be re-parameterized by multiple vector functions of t.

title: Circle parameterization
description: Circle parameterization. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Parameterization demo - circle: Draw a curve parameterized by t in [0, 1]. The same curve can be re-parameterized by multiple vector functions of t.

title: Polynomial curve Parameterization
description: Polynomial curve Parameterization. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Parameterization demo - polynomial: Draw a curve parameterized by t in [0, 1]. The same curve can be re-parameterized by multiple vector functions of t.

title: Angle along polynomial curves
description: Angle along polynomial curves. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Curve derivative demo - parametric: Draw a curve parameterized by t in [0, 1]. Use the derivative parameterized by t in [0, 1] to rotate the rectangle.

title: Angle along quadratic curves
description: Angle along quadratic curves. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Curve derivative demo - quadratic hermite: Draw a curve based on p0 p1 p'0 p'1 parameterized by t in [0, 1]. Use the derivative parameterized by t in [0, 1] to rotate the rectangle.

title: Angle along cubic curves
description: Angle along cubic curves. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Curve derivative demo - cubic hermite: Draw a curve based on p0 p1 p'0 p'1 parameterized by t in [0, 1]. Use the derivative parameterized by t in [0, 1] to rotate the rectangle.

title: Circle subdivision curve
description: Circle subdivision curve. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas. Subdivision demo - circle: The slider controls the number of edges to do draw the regular polygon that approximates the circle.

title: De Casteljau construction
description: De Casteljau construction. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons, checkboxes. De Casteljau demo: Enter the list of control points and the u parameter to compute the value of the Bezier curve at u.

title: Find control points given tangent
description: Find control points given tangent. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons, checkboxes. Bezier curve tangent demo: Enter the list of control points for one or more Bezier curves to see the curve and the tangents.

title: Continuous quadratic curves
description: Continuous quadratic curves. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Bezier curve demo - quadratic: Draw a curve using quadraticCurveTo(...) or bezierCurveTo(...).

title: Continuous cubic curves
description: Continuous cubic curves. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons. Bezier curve demo - quadratic: Draw a curve using quadraticCurveTo(...) or bezierCurveTo(...).

title: Connect two Bezier curves
description: Connect two Bezier curves. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons, checkboxes. Bezier curve tangent demo: Enter the list of control points for one or more Bezier curves to see the curve and the tangents. Separate two curves by an empty line. Only quadratic and cubic curves are supported.

title: Cardinal Catmull-Rom spline
description: Cardinal Catmull-Rom spline. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons. Cardinal spline demo: Enter the list of control points for one or more Bezier curves to see the curve and the tangents.

title: Chaikin's corner cutting algorithm
description: Chaikin's corner cutting algorithm. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons, checkboxes. Chaikin's Algorithm demo: Enter the list of original control points to see quadratic B-spline construction.

title: Arc-length parameterization
description: Arc-length parameterization. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons. Arc length demo: Enter the list of control points for one or more Bezier curves to see the curve and the tangents.

title: Hello cube THREE.js
description: Hello cube THREE.js. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons. THREE.js Hello Cube demo: Draw a cube using THREE.js.

title: THREE.js lights
description: THREE.js lights. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Light demo: Write a function that creates and return a light to light the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: THREE.js materials
description: THREE.js materials. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Material demo: Write a function that creates and return a material for the object in the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: THREE.js cameras
description: THREE.js cameras. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Camera demo: Write a function that creates and return a camera to view the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: THREE.js animation as a function of state
description: THREE.js animation as a function of state. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. 3D Animation first demo (use state): Write a function of time that moves the object in the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: THREE.js animation as a function of time
description: THREE.js animation as a function of time. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. 3D Animation second demo (use transformation): Write a function of time that moves the object in the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: THREE.js hierarchy
description: THREE.js hierarchy. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. 3D Animation third demo (with hierarchy): Write a function of time that moves the object in the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: Camera rotation
description: Camera rotation. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. 3D Animation camera demo (road): Write a function that moves the camera related in the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: Camera rotation too
description: Camera rotation too. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. 3D Animation camera demo (road): Write a function that moves the camera related in the scene. The objects are placed at (1, 0, 1), (-1, 0, 1), (1, 0, -1), (-1, 0, -1).

title: Extrude geometry
description: Extrude geometry. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Special geometry (Extrude) demo: Write the code to build special geometries.

title: Lathe geometry
description: Lathe geometry. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Special geometry (Lathe) demo: Write the code to build special geometries.

title: Tube geometry
description: Tube geometry. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Special geometry (Tube) demo: Write the code to build special geometries.

title: Buffer geometries
description: Buffer geometries. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes. Buffer geometry demo: Write the vertices and index sets to construct the BufferGeometry.

title: Morph target
description: Morph target. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Morph demo: Write the code to morph a sphere to something else.

title: Spot the cow morphing
description: Spot the cow morphing. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Morph demo (cow): Write the code to morph the cow to something else.

title: Key frame animation
description: Key frame animation. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Key frame animation demo: Write the code to set the key frames.

title: Key frame animation for skinned mesh
description: Key frame animation for skinned mesh. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Key frame animation demo - skinned mesh: Write the code to set the key frames.

title: Key frame animation for cow
description: Key frame animation for cow. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Key frame animation demo - skinned mesh for cow: Write the code to set the key frames.

title: Texture UV mapping
description: Texture UV mapping. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Texture UV demo: Draw the texture in the HTML Canvas. Write the UV maps to map parts of the image onto the triangles as the texture.

title: Normal map texture
description: Normal map texture. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Normal Map Texture UV demo: Draw the texture in the HTML Canvas. Write the UV maps to map parts of the image onto the triangles as the normal map.

title: Bump map texture
description: Bump map texture. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Bump Map Texture UV demo: Draw the texture in the HTML Canvas. Write the UV maps to map parts of the image onto the triangles as the bump map.

title: Barycentric coordinate system
description: Barycentric coordinate system. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes. Texture Barycentric Mapping demo: Compute the UV coordinate of a point on the triangle.

title: Tri-linear interpolation
description: Tri-linear interpolation. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas. Tri-linear interpolation demo: Place the points between pixel centers to interpolate. Drag the point between mipmaps to interpolate.

title: Painter's algorithm and Z-Buffer
description: Painter's algorithm and Z-Buffer. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes. Painter's Algorithm and Z-Buffer demo: Write the vertices construct the BufferGeometry. Click on a pixel to find the distance values of each triangle.

title: Basic shader
description: Basic shader. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo: Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Shader uniform attribute varying variables
description: Shader uniform attribute varying variables. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - More variables: Use uniforms t and u and attributes v. Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Shader textures
description: Shader textures. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - Textures: Use texture uniforms tex. Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Shader functions (step, smoothstep)
description: Shader functions (step, smoothstep). Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons. Step function demo: Write up to three functions of u or v to visualize the function between 0 and 1. List of functions to try: clamp, fract, mix, smoothstep, step, trunc.

title: Cosine law
description: Cosine law. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas. Cosine law demo: Move the end points of the arrows to change the light and camera directions. Highlight the cosine of the angle that affects diffuse and specular lighting.

title: Shader Phong lighting model
description: Shader Phong lighting model. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - Light: Use lp and lc as the position and color the light. Red vector is E (unit eye direction). Green vector is N (unit normal direction). Blue vector is L (unit light direction). White vector is R (unit reflected light direction). Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Shader Phong lighting model too
description: Shader Phong lighting model too. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - Light: Use lp and lc as the position and color the light. Red vector is E (unit eye direction). Green vector is N (unit normal direction). Blue vector is L (unit light direction). White vector is R (unit reflected light direction). Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Shader stripes
description: Shader stripes. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - Procedural texture: Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Triangle rasterization
description: Triangle rasterization. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Rasterization demo - Triangles: When "Draw" is checked, use mouse or touch to draw lines; when "Draw" is not checked, use mouse or touch to select a region to show pixel colors. Use the textarea to write a function(canvas, context) and use the button to evaluate the function.

title: Aliasing sin function
description: Aliasing sin function. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Aliasing demo: x and y are from -1 to 1. Write different functions so when they are sampled, they look the same.

title: Shader stripes with blur
description: Shader stripes with blur. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - Anti-aliasing by blurring: Write the vertex and fragment shaders. Use u to control the number of stripes and t to control the amount of blur.

title: Shader checker board
description: Shader checker board. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - CheckerBoard texture: Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Aliasing derivative
description: Aliasing derivative. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Image derivative demo: x and y are from -1 to 1. Demo for dFdx, dFdy, fwidth for some function F.

title: Shader noise
description: Shader noise. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - Noise texture: Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Shader wood
description: Shader wood. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with buttons, checkboxes, a color picker. Shader demo - Wood texture: Write the vertex and fragment shaders.

title: Perlin noise 2D
description: Perlin noise 2D. Interactive demo showing a 2D canvas with buttons, checkboxes. Perlin noise demo: Simple implementation of 2D Perlin noise. The gradient uses Math.random without a seed: this should not be used in a shader.

title: Ray tracing diagram (not demo)
description: Ray tracing diagram (not demo). Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with checkboxes. Ray tracing diagram (not a demo): Click anywhere to cast a ray.

title: Particle effects
description: Particle effects. Interactive demo showing a Three.js canvas scene with a code textbox, buttons, checkboxes. Particle demo using InstancedMesh: Write the code to move all particles are the same time. Use an empty group (and apply transformations to it) to create the matrix and copy to each particle.
